room_title: Escape room "Lost Pyramid" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
room_description:
At the time of the Pharaohâ€™s death, a great pyramid was built as a tomb for his body and as a testament to his splendor. But in a fit of jealousy, the gods hurled down a large stone and the pyramid was buried deep in the desert sand.
After four thousand years, the Lost Pyramid has become unearthed. All the mysteries of ancient Egypt are now within our grasp, but require the bravest among us to enter the cursed tomb and make peace with the gods. Can you unravel Pharaoh's ancient feud, or will you share his fate trapped inside the Lost Pyramid?
